front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments - Security Services for Applications and Management Messages

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines secure message formats and processing for use by Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) devices, including methods to secure WAVE management messages and methods to secure application messages. It also describes administrative functions necessary to support the core security functions.
